projects.title: My Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Portfolio Website made in **React**
 -  Fully customizable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Task Man - Your personal task manager
projects.bodyText:
- A simple Task Manager web app made with **React.js**.
 - Uses **Redux** and **localstorage** to add, delete or update tasks.
- Added filtering based on date, status and priority with drag and drop to auto change priority.

projects.title: Wanderlust - Your Travel Partner
projects.bodyText:
- Developed using **Node.js**and **Express.js**.
 - Database is managed using **MongoDB**.
 - **EJS templating** and **Bootstrap 5** is used for designing the frontend.

projects.title: Spotify Clone
projects.bodyText: - Built the Spotify web homepage using **HTML** and **CSS**.

projects.title: Electronics Shop Management
projects.bodyText:
- A database management system designed using **MySQL**, **Node.js** and **Express.js**.
 - **EJS templating** and **Bootstrap 5** is used for designing the frontend.
